content: have you ever wanted to just crochet the day away the forever blanket is a beginner friendly crochet pattern and you re going to love it for many reasons this crochet blanket is a simple double_crochet blanket pattern best suited for those who are interested in a mindless crochet sit in front of the tv and relax with this easy blanket and you ll be shocked to see how much you get done the best part is you can make this forever blanket to pass down from generation to generation or make one for a friend so they can do the same materials needed - 8 skeins red heart super saver - 5 5mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - scissors
